Author: PoorLama
Text: Are you me? I bought a new digital scale today and it showed me being a pound heavier than when I weighed myself a week ago, despite only eating 1200cal at 6'0 for the last week.     I. Freaked. Out.    Now I'm stuck thinking my metabolism is waaay lower than I thought, that 1200cal is too much and is making me gain weight.
